text.autoconfig.patsb.title: Potions As They Should Be
text.autoconfig.patsb.option.potionMaxSt: The maximum size for potion stacks.
text.autoconfig.patsb.option.potionMixEn: Turn on ability to combine potions.
text.autoconfig.patsb.option.mixedPotion: Way to compute color of mixed potions. Does not affect already mixed potions.
text.autoconfig.patsb.option.fixedMixedP: The color of mixed potion. Used when Fixed Color mode is set.
